title: Hi no Tori: Yamato-hen (The Phoenix: Chapter of Yamato)
synopsis: At his father's command, Oguna, the youngest prince of Yamato, sets out to kill Takeru Kawakami, the leader of Kumaso. However, upon arriving in Kumaso territory, he is injured by the stray arrow of a young local woman named Kajika who is hunting game. Eager to compensate for the terrible mistake, she escorts Oguna to her village to treat his wound. But as the two rapidly fall in love, the prince makes a disturbing discovery: Kajika is Takeru's younger sister!
related_anime: ['Hi no Tori', 'Hi no Tori: Uchuu-hen', 'Hi no Tori: Houou-hen', 'Hi no Tori (1967)']
